title: ‘Purely Out of Love for the Sport’: Wout van Aert Unveils Compact Cyclocross Calendar in Preparation for Road Season
content:
No world championships, but cross star Van Aert will make long-awaited return with short, intense block of off-road racing.

Read the full article at ‘Purely Out of Love for the Sport’: Wout van Aert Unveils Compact Cyclocross Calendar in Preparation for Road Season on Velo.
author: sstokes
